PreferenceScreen.title: Select Country & Language
PreferenceScreen.sub_title: Please select your country and language

RecoveryPhraseScreen.text_info_1: The secret phrase is the master key to your account.
RecoveryPhraseScreen.text_info_2: You can use this phrase to recover your account.
RecoveryPhraseScreen.text_info_3: Please copy and keep it in a safe place.

VerifyOTPScreen.title: We've just sent you a verification code
VerifyOTPScreen.sub_title_1: We just sent you the verification code to

ConnectionListScreen.title: Create Connections
ConnectionListScreen.sub_title: Select the organisations from which you want to receive credentials.

SecurityScreen.title: Be Secure
SecurityScreen.sub_title: Using biometric and pincode security significantly reduces the chances your account will be compromised in case your phone is lost or stolen.

PincodeScreen.title: Enter a new six-digit PIN.
PincodeScreen.sub_title: This pin is required when sharing your data
PincodeScreen.confirm_pin_sub_title: Re-enter PIN that you have entered on previous screen.
PincodeScreen.alert_message: Your pincode is set successfully. Please keep it safe and secure.

NotifyMeScreen.title: Get notified
NotifyMeScreen.sub_title: We use push notifications to deliver messages for important events, such as when you receive a new digital certificate.

ActionsScreen.empty_list_text: There are no actions to complete, Please scan a QR code to either get a digital certificate or to prove it.
ActionsScreen.notification_alert_message: Notifications are disabled. You will not be able to receive alerts for the actions. Pull down to refresh and receive the latest actions.

CredentialsScreen.all_certificates_empty_list_text: There are no certificates in your wallet. Please check the Actions Tab for any Certificate Offers or tap the "+" button at the bottom right to request a certificate.
CredentialsScreen.groups_empty_list_text: There are no certificate groups in your wallet. Create first by clicking on plus button
CredentialsScreen.group_name_error_message: Group name should contain at least 2 characters
CredentialsScreen.select_credential_error_message: Please select at least one credential

QRScreen.title: Point your camera to a QR code to scan

ContactUsScreen.title: For questions and support, donâ€™t hesitate to contact us on any of the following:

AboutUsScreen.text_1: ZADA is a Digital Identity Technology Company, driven to ensure everyone can provide and use digital services without risk for fraud or privacy intrusion.
AboutUsScreen.text_2: Using ZADA, you are in full control of your data. You decide what you want to receive and what you want to share with who.
AboutUsScreen.text_3: ZADA is leading a revolution in how personal information is managed, and by using ZADA you are part of this change!
AboutUsScreen.text_4: To contribute back to the community, the ZADA App is created as an open source project, originally created by Trustnet Pakistan, so other companies that want to launch a wallet on ZADA Network also can do that.
AboutUsScreen.text_5: ZADA is not just an app but an ecosystem, a network, and a mission to ensure everyone can provide and use digital services without risk for fraud or privacy intrusion!

errors.countryNotSupported: Your connection appears to be blocked. Please try to disable any VPN, check your internet connection, and try again. If the issue persists, contact support for assistance.

errors.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.invalid_pincode: You entered incorrect pincode. Please check your pincode and try again
errors.invalid_old_pincode: You entered wrong old pincode. Please enter the correct.
errors.required_account_deletion: Please set your EMAIL in order to continue with account deletion.
errors.length_name: Please enter a name between {{min}}-{{max}} alphabetical characters long. No numbers or special characters.
errors.length_current_password: Password length should be {{min}} to {{max}} characters
errors.length_new_password: Password length should be {{min}} to {{max}} characters
errors.length_old_pincode: Old pincode should contain only {{max}} digits
errors.length_new_pincode: New pincode should contain only {{max}} digits.
errors.length_confirm_pincode: Confirm pincode should contain only {{max}} digits.

errors.password_not_match: New Password and Confirm Password should be same
errors.pincode_confirm_not_match: Pincode and confirm pincode are not same. Please check them carefully
errors.biometric_not_supported: Please ensure your device has Biometric/FaceID and is configured correctly, then try again.

messages.delete_request: Are you sure you want to delete this request?
messages.delete_certificate: Are you sure you want to delete this certificate?
